Because the people of Azerbaijan had gained independence and freedom for centuries. The Azerbaijani people already had their own state.

Democratic development was going on, women were given the right to vote, the National Army was established.

Azerbaijan-US relations have a great history. Maybe it's not too long, but there are very important relationships.
From the early days of our independence, we have established a special partnership. It has eventually become a strategic partnership.
In different fields - economy, trade, investments - American companies are one of the major investors in Azerbaijan.
Our political contacts and dialogue are at a very high level, very active.
We are closely cooperating on energy security, economic diversification, political reform, (cont) http://t.co/Z1lyEPrtMx
We work together on global security issues.
Our servicemen participate in peacekeeping operations in different parts of the world and serve together in Afghanistan.
Azerbaijan provides transportation of 40 percent of cargo to Afghanistan, and our route can be considered as the most stable route.
Our cooperation with NATO should be assessed from the aspect of our bilateral relations and these relationships are getting stronger day by day.
Azerbaijan is a reliable partner in this region. We prove this by our real actions, not just statements.
The United States plays an active role in the settlement of the Armenian-Azerbaijani Nagorno-Karabakh conflict. The US is among the co-chairs of the Minsk Group.
Unfortunately, no results have yet been achieved in this area. Our lands are still occupied.
We welcome the statement on the inadmissibility of the status quo at the highest level of leadership in the United States.
It is exactly the same with our position and is the demand of today's day.
Another important area of ​​our relationships is energy security. In this area, we have been closely cooperating with the United States since 1994
The Baku-Tbilisi-Ceyhan oil pipeline was built and put into operation with the support of the US administration.
Azerbaijan's opportunities are expanding. In terms of carrying out economic reforms, Azerbaijan has very good indicators.
International financial institutions also confirm this. That is why we are sure that Azerbaijan's successful development will continue.
